subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The renaming of the Yankees’ ballpark in Tampa from Legends Field to Steinbrenner Field runs against the hideous trend of hanging transient corporate names on major league ballparks.
snippet: The renaming of the Yankees’ ballpark in Tampa from Legends Field to Steinbrenner Field runs against the hideous trend of hanging transient corporate names on major league ballparks.
